extendedIngredients.name: fudge
extendedIngredients.originalString: Hot fudge, heated very briefly to make it easy to stir- but not hot

extendedIngredients.name: m&m's
extendedIngredients.originalString: Red, white and blue M&M'S (or original)

extendedIngredients.name: pound cake
extendedIngredients.originalString: Prepared pound cake (homemade, store bought or frozen), cut into 3/4-inch squares

recipes.title: No Bake Patriotic Hot Fudge Cheesecake Trifles
recipes.instructions: Prepare the cheesecake whipped cream: In a medium bowl, use an electric mixer to combine the cream cheese and sugar. Add the heavy whipping cream and mix until thick and creamy- about 1 minute. Assemble the trifles: You can make 4 good sized individual trifles or 8 smaller trifles (I recommend short plastic cups if you're making them for a party= easy clean-up!) Layer the trifles in this order: cake, M&M's, cheesecake whipped cream, hot fudge... then continue the same layering until you get to the top- ending with whipped cream and M&M'S.

steps.step: Prepare the cheesecake whipped cream: In a medium bowl, use an electric mixer to combine the cream cheese and sugar.

Add the heavy whipping cream and mix until thick and creamy- about 1 minute. Assemble the trifles: You can make 4 good sized individual trifles or 8 smaller trifles (I recommend short plastic cups if you're making them for a party= easy clean-up!) Layer the trifles in this order: cake, M&M's, cheesecake whipped cream, hot fudge... then continue the same layering until you get to the top- ending with whipped cream and M&M'S.
